hero.title: Connect with AI Coding Tools
hero.description: Viber.vn is a gateway that helps you access and use Augment Code, Claude Code, OpenCode, OpenClaw easily. Vietnamese documentation, 24/7 support.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Gateway connects you with AI coding tools like Augment Code and Claude Code through a single access point.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Vietnamese documentation, step-by-step guides, easy to setup and use.

support.title: Support
support.description: Active Telegram community, support team ready to help 24/7.

step1.title: Visit Gateway
step1.description: Visit viber.vn and create a gateway account to start using AI coding tools

step2.title: Join Community
step2.description: Join our Telegram community for account setup guidance and service activation

community.title: Community
community.description: Join our Telegram group to chat about coding, vibe code, AI tools, and everything related to programming.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Access gateway to connect with AI coding tools

footer.description: Gateway connecting you with AI Coding Tools
